name: smokescreen
effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.
